articles.description: Listen to 5 Live commentary and follow live text updates as Newcastle host West Ham plus seven more fixtures in the Premier League.

articles.title: Women's Six Nations: England v Wales - watch, radio & text

articles.description: Napoli's players took the knee before their match on Saturday in support of team-mate Juan Jesus.
articles.title: Napoli players take knee in support of team-mate Jesus

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama hits a career-high 40 points as the San Antonio Spurs hold off the New York Knicks.
articles.title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama scores career-high 40 points in San Antonio Spurs victory

articles.description: Substitute Harvey Barnes scores two late goals as Newcastle edge a seven-goal thriller against West Ham at St James' Park.
articles.title: Newcastle claim dramatic late win against West Ham

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler's record-breaking streak of 28 consecutive rounds under par on the PGA Tour comes to an end at the Houston Open.
articles.title: PGA Tour: Scottie Scheffler's record-breaking under par streak ends at Houston Open

articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of Saturday's Premiership and lower-league action, including live Sportsound commentary of Rangers v Hibernian.
articles.title: Build-up as Rangers host Hibs in one of five Scottish Premiership games

articles.description: Khadija Shaw scores twice as Manchester City ruthlessly dismantle Liverpool to move three points clear at the top of the WSL table.
articles.title: Ruthless Man City beat Liverpool to go top of WSL

articles.description: Former Wales rugby star Louis Rees-Zammit joins back-to-back Super Bowl champions the Kansas City Chiefs.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Former Wales rugby union wing lands NFL contract with Kansas City Chiefs

articles.description: Cambridge win both the men's and women's Boat Races for the second year running.
articles.title: Boat Race 2024: Cambridge comfortably beat Oxford in both men's and women's races
